channel.title: Comments on: Stop mirroring for server reboot
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
I pause them also, we had SAN work where the mirror was located, I paused them, resumed them after the work was completed, it worked like a charm

definitely did NOT want to recreate a mirror on a TB+ database
